Name: Glass Jar
Description: A jar to ferment non-alcoholic beverages. Turns mushrooms into kombucha. Also turns apples into cider and ginger into ginger ale!

Produce.Name: Kombucha
Produce.Description: A tea-like drink made from fermented mushrooms.

SpecialProduce.Name: Kombucha
SpecialProduce.Description: A uniquely nutty tea-like drink made from fermented mushrooms.

SpecialProduce.Name: Kombucha
SpecialProduce.Description: A fruity, slightly peppery tea-like drink made from fermented mushrooms.

SpecialProduce.Name: Red Kombucha
SpecialProduce.Description: A cautionary tale in kombucha recipes.

SpecialProduce.Name: Purple Kombucha
SpecialProduce.Description: A purple tea-like drink made from fermented mushrooms.
